name: Cats VS Dogs (CostaDev)
description:
Cats versus Dogs is a game in which you control a cute cat. Beware you absolutely have to dodge the bad dogs!!!

How do you move the cat?

To make this game, I've set a constraint, the player can only use the space key to move around. The cat has a constant speed and moves either vertically or horizontally. 
Each time you press the space key, the direction changes.

How do I know which direction the cat will go if I press the space bar?

The cat will go back to the direction it was going before the previous change of direction.

Now you have all the information you need to break all the records ;) I hope you will have a lot of fun with my game!

Don't hesitate to give me feedback ;)
